description:
Welcome to the Home of Media


We are large, but we are still personal. We are international, yet down to earth. We are innovative, creative, and digital.

As Europe's most effective partner for holistic product and brand communication, we want to make our customers and their brands irresistible.

To achieve this, we create with over 600 employees at 8 locations new content and optimize existing one. We design and implement customized systems to manage content and present it perfectly in all channels.

We consult with many years of expertise and help our customers to implement increasingly complex communication in a perfect, simple and structured way, to make it irresistible at all touchpoints and therefore successful. 

Our Ho Chi Minh City branch is growing fast since November 2015 and together with our German colleagues we are providing media production and IT services!

Why you'll love working here

  • Diverse and interesting projects
  • Long-term personal development and social support
  • Flexible working times

What awaits you

  • A professional working atmosphere in a committed and successful team
  • Diverse and interesting projects with a high level of personal responsibility and independence
  • Improvement of your English skills by daily communication
  • Flat hierarchies, appreciation and respect as well as a feel-good environment


What we can offer you

  • Fair and competitive salary
  • Annual performance review and two performance reviews in the first year
  • Performance and Tet bonus
  • Full salary for sick leaves with doctor’s notes (75% from local Social Insurance Department and 25% from our company)
  • 15 vacation days
  • English training courses
  • Business trips and training at the headquarter in Germany
  • Private health-insurance after probation
  • Company trip, team building activities
  • Free soft drinks in the office and every Friday outdoor coffee gathering with the team
location: Số 9-11 Đường Đống Đa, Phường 02, Quận Tân Bình, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
keySkills: Java, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, SQL
